ConversationMessageDefinition.label: Have you uploaded your wire receipt?

primitiveValues.formulaTemplate:
To upload your wire transfer receipt and have your deposit credited, follow these steps:

  1. Log in to your Ndax account: https://ndax.io/auth/login
  2. Click Deposit at the top of the screen, or navigate to your wallet and select CAD and select 'Deposit'
  3. Select Wire Transfer.
  4. Click Upload a Receipt.
  5. Enter your full name exactly as it appears on the wire receipt.
  6. Enter the amount of your wire transfer.
  7. Click "Click here to select a file", then upload an image or PDF of your wire receipt.
  8. Click Submit.

âœ… Once submitted, our team will be notified and will review your wire receipt.

If everything is in order, your account will be credited within 1 hour if the wire has arrived.
